long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take advantage of many of the incredible Pinch Payments features with our handy new extension, Pinch Plus.
Track your Pre-Approval (autopayment) agreements and customer payment info right from inside your accounting system by simply navigating to contacts or invoices.
With Pinch Plus you can even take payments yourself without leaving the comfort of Xero, QuickBooks, HubSpot, Cin7 Core, Field Insight or QuickB2B.
Join 2000+ Australian and New Zealand small businesses in using Pinch to say goodbye to late payment for good.

Free features include:
Pre-Approvals: Store, update and view your autopayment agreements without needing to leave Xero, QuickBooks, HubSpot, Cin7 Core, Field Insight or QuickB2B. Now you can see whether the customer you're about to raise an invoice for already has agreed to autopayments!
Customer Portal: Copy your customers unique Customer Portal invite and include it when sending invoices out of Xero.
Pay Now links and merchant initiated payments: Need to take a payment over the phone? With Pinch Plus you can simply click a button and open an online payment page allowing you to process payments on behalf of customers.
Questions?

To use Pinch Plus you will need a Pinch account. To set one up go here: https://app.getpinch.com.au/Register

Once you set one up all you need to do is install the extension and navigate to Xero or QuickBooks where you'll see the Pinch icon in the nav bar.


Learn more about Pinch Plus by visiting our website.
If you need more help be sure to check out helpdesk.getpinch.com.au.
